original_text: God is the one who said, ‘Let light shine in the dark.’ And he is the one who has caused his light to shine deep inside us. Because of that, we know how great and powerful God is. We see that his power shines brightly in Christ's face.
korean_text: 어두운 데에 빛이 비치라 말씀하셨던 그 하나님께서 예수 그리스도의 얼굴에 있는 하나님의 영광을 아는 빛을 우리 마음에 비추셨느니라

sentences.original_text: God is the one who said
who has caused his light to shine
we know how great and powerful God is.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 얼마나 위대하고 강력하신지 알게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: We see that his power shines brightly
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그의 능력이 밝게 빛나는 것을 봅니다
